document_data.name: ''Magick of Gnomengarde''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Magick of Gnomengarde''''' was a [[spellbook]] that was studied and shared by all [[gnomes]] of [[Gnomengarde]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The [[leather]]-bound spellbook displayed the title "Magick of Gnomengarde" in both [[Gnome language|Gnomish]] and [[Common]]. It was stored on a wooden pedestal atop a ledge overlooking the workshop in which Gnomengarde's inventors crafted [[magic]] items.
document_data.Powers:
''Magick of Gnomengarde'' contained the following [[spell]]s:

:''[[burning hands]] • [[detect magic]] • [[identify]] • [[mage armor]] • [[magic missile]] • [[shield]] • [[sleep]]''
